tls:text.tls:line: how do I have leisure to be anxious about my futuréí?

beyond the seas there was (trimming=) order.

tls:text.tls:line: would that I had not acted96!

tls:text.tls:line: it is (suitable:) right that your sons and grandsons should be numerous.

sense.def: particle marking the end of a comparison, resumptively: "like that, in that way"

sense.def: 君子之說N1=agent or subject of the Nab-ing (perhaps 之 = 之所？）
quickly, without delay, in a hurry
wickedness, bad points; wicked forces; wicked acts
opening piece, beginning piece (e.g. in a collection of poetry)
a kind of tree (K. plum tree)
P: bitter herb; K: some kind of Sonchus or Lactuca
offer food, particularly to those working in the fields
lift high up in the air
mountain with large top and without a very large base
持盈守成"safeguard the plenitude of what one has and safeguard what one has achieved": maintain and safeguard the plenitude of one's achievements without aiming for more than can be safely maintained.
地之所載"what the earth bears up" (and NEVER "what bears up the earth"): the object which the preceding N V-s

tls:text.tls:line: the dust will (darken=) blind you;

sense.def: dust; sand; (also abstractly in a transferred sense: defilement)

tls:text.tls:line: The dust will cover you;

sense.def: dust; sand; (also abstractly in a transferred sense: defilement)

tls:text.tls:line: he does not talk with me!

sense.def: 不與我言"does not talk to me": converse

tls:text.tls:line: alas for us,
The man who (followed me =) associated with me is so arrogant;

sense.def: cause N to V, bring it about that N V-s 使之聞之 [NB: the first 之shows that the object of 使 does function as an object and not only as a subject of wén 聞. Thus technically speaking we do not have a sentence after the vt.]

tls:text.tls:line: the Son of Heaven ordered us

sense.def: order formally (typically at a general or rather formal level) the N to V

tls:text.tls:line: and halt in the grounds of Zhu;

tls:text.tls:line: with axes one (hews:) lops them174;
and so they became subject to Zhou.
how should I not be glad!
(Heaven) sends down felicity (upon him) that is very restful.
(Heaven) sends down felicity (upon him) that is very restful.
he whom I call "that man"
how much more those men -

sense.def: Eunuch, author of a poem in Shijing

tls:text.tls:line: has made this ode,
carefully listen to it
